name: 林鈞陶
objective: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解數位訊號處理的理論基礎及其應用技巧。課程內容主要包含：(1)相關信號函數及其應用 (2)傅立葉係數與頻譜 (3)FIR濾波器 (4)離散傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉轉換 (5)Z-轉換 (6)IIR濾波器 (7)其他工程應用及實例研討。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction.
Week 2: Sinusoids.
Week 3: Spectrum Representation. 
Week 4: Spectrum Representation.
Week 5: Sampling and Aliasing.
Week 6: Sampling and Aliasing.
Week 7: FIR Filters.
Week 8: FIR Filters.
Week 9: Midterm 
Week 10: Frequency Response of FIR Filters.
Week 11: Frequency Response of FIR Filters.
Week 12: Discrete-Time Fourier Transform.  
Week 13: Discrete Fourier Transform.
Week 14: Z-Transform.
Week 15: IIR Filters. 
Week 16: IIR Filters.
Week 17: IIR Filters.
Week 18: Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
期中考30 %
期末考30 %
小考(作業)30%
其他 10%
materials:
1. Slides
2. J. M. McClellan, R. W. Schafer, and M. A. Yoker, DSP First, Pearson, 2017。
